welcome_message_body: Welcome to Coatzacoalcos, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer. Bienvenidos!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minatitlan Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minatitlan Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
